Revolutionary tech platform that transforms higher education and gives students the ability to control, improve and amplify their education investment.
Member, Board of Trustees; Chair, Enrollment Management Committee

The ICC provides advice and assistance to the Department of Developmental Services (DDS), lead agency responsible for the administration of Early Start under Part C of the Individuals with Disabilities Act (IDEA).

Transformed a boutique CRM firm into a publicly-traded education technology services company that enabled colleges and universities to generate nearly $ 300 million in tuition, served over 1.5 million students, and generated over $ 1.4 billion in donations to major non-profits. Annual revenues that exceeded $ 17 million.  Executive leadership of the company’s vision/corporate strategy, major client relationships, business development, product concept development, contract negotiations, consulting for key education clients, investor relations/presentations, and capital fundraising. Incubated and spun off two companies increasing shareholder value for Greenwood Hall.Major Clients IncludedFortune 500 - AT&T, CBS, Walt Disney Company, Wells Fargo Bank, Comcast, and American ExpressNon-Profit – American Red Cross, National World War II Memorial, United States Holocaust Museum, Habitat for Humanity, Comic Relief, Entertainment Industry Foundation, SU2C, NAACPGovernment - United Nations, U.S. Department of Defense, White House Conference on AgingEducation - Pepperdine University, Texas Tech University, Wayne State University, University of Mississippi, University of Houston, Simmons College, Capella University, University of Massachusetts, Pepperdine University, University of Maine, University of Arizona, Maricopa Community College District, South Carolina Technical College System, University of South Alabama, Full Sail University, Orange Coast Community College District, and University of Central FloridaHealth Care – Banner Health, Children’s Hopsital Los Angeles, Genentech

Co-founded, incubated within Greenwood Hall, and developed key business relationships for a full-service interactive agency that went from no revenue to over $ 20 million in annual sales in just three years and 50 employees; found buyer and successfully sold business in 2010 to US International Media.

October 21, 2014, John was a client of Emily’s

I worked with John on my TechOut LA tech education conference and was really impressed by his professionalism and talent as a speaker. At our conference, he delivered a keynote that was deeply customized to serve our audience of educators, students and entrepreneurs. As a professional who works with countless speakers, I was blown away by John's authenticity, ability to deliver a compelling message, and willingness to interact with the audience following his keynote. If you're looking for an education or edtech speaker, John is a great choice.

July 26, 2013, Elizabeth worked with John but at different companies

I have had the pleasure of working with Dr. Hall in the context of his advocacy for students with disabilities. Each time I have seen him speak he has exhibited an exceptional ability to connect with his audience. For instance, he recently did a presentation at the University of La Verne College of Law, and the feedback was unanimous: he is a true inspiration. Indeed, several law students now label him their "hero." Due to the reach and effectiveness of his presentation, I often seek out additional opportunities to collaborate with him, and would strongly recommend him to anyone seeking an effective communicator.

Todd Dechter
Business Development Executive / Trusted Adviser
July 25, 2013, John was senior to Todd but didn’t manage directly

I heartily recommend doing business with John Hall, for my experience with him is one of many lessons learned with great appreciation. Many times leaders are unfairly criticized, or conversely, they sometimes gain the lion’s share of praise when an organization succeeds, overlooking the fact that it takes a team to win. I honestly can say that John Hall is not that person, for he has earned his stripes with grace and class.  John appreciates how when a company goes through battle together, it often come out stronger on the other side.  As a boss, he was in the trenches.  He never said no to going on trips or making calls together. He often edified his people publicly, making them feel as important as he was in meetings.  He is a solid organizational manager, a savvy strategist, and is a respected advisor within his industry.  Yet, the key reason for me why I recommend doing business with John Hall is how he acknowledges his people.  Always replying to every email sent him, always praising the person who closed a new contract whether big or small, and always supports his employees when they go through hard times (as his partner Zan does).  With John, you’ll not just get an advocate on your side, but a friend who remembers the little things.

summary: Proven CEO of public and private corporations. Founded and shepherded two successful exits of technology and financial services brands and founded a multimillion dollar public company that is a category leader in the higher education student lifecycle management category. Serve as a trusted advisor to start-up and established enterprises, major NGOs, and university presidents.
